short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to upload Facebook feed posts for volunteers to the MyFiltr disinformation analysis project

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By installing this extension you can help us understand what is shared on Facebook, how it is filtered, and when it is shown to you.

MyFiltr is a non-profit organization which wants to increase knowledge about how what we do online affects our individual lives and our society. We want to promote democratic societal development and a constructive climate of debate, and we believe that one of the most important aspects of achieving this is to ensure that people are aware of how the time we spend online affects us.
